column1: #  Valid values are: 'date', 'water_line' and all the ice types: 'black_ice', 'slush_ice', 'slush', 'snow'.
#  Hashtags are omitted and ' ', \n and such are removed when reading the file.
#  An observation with only date is of "no ice".
#  water_line is the distance from the bottom of the iceflow to the waterline in [m]. water_line is sum(icelayers)-ice_height_after.
